% https://tex.stackexchange.com/a/133768/102826
% possibly useful but probably not:
\def\expandArg #1#2{\expandafter\expandArgaux\expandafter{#2}{#1}}
\def\expandArgaux #1#2{#2{#1}}
% autogenerated content, requires package xstring
\newcommand{\lucidcharat}[1]{
\edef\tmpp{#1}
\IfEq{\tmpp}{0}{1}{}%
\IfEq{\tmpp}{1}{2}{}%
\IfEq{\tmpp}{2}{2}{}%
}
%end autogenerated content
